title: QR code authentication, a simple and fast authentication method for Frontline Workers
description:
We are thrilled to announce public preview of QR code authentication in Entra ID, providing an efficient and simple authentication method for frontline workers. 
 
 You will see a new authentication method ‘QR code’ in Entra ID Authentication method Policies. You can enable and add QR code for your frontline workers via Entra ID, My Staff, or MS Graph APIs. All users in your tenant will see a new link Sign in with QR code on navigating to https://login.microsoftonline.com > Sign-in options > Sign in to an organization page. This new link will be visible only on mobile devices (Android/iOS/iPadOS). Users can use this auth method only if you have added and provided a QR code to them. QR code auth is also available in BlueFletch and Jamf.
